name: Battle Blocks (itch)
description:
Battle Blocks is a competitive local multiplayer game where players build and battle robots. Buy a variety of weapons and building blocks from the shop, and strategize how to best construct your robot. Then, enter battle, and try to destroy the other player's energy core before they destroy you!

Credits:

William Perry - Audio Production, music, and SFX
Nicolas Tejerizo - Music, SFX
Xinyuan Sun - Music
Ryan Anderson and Luke Greenwood - Usability

Controls:
Please see the tutorial section on the main menu for diagrams.
This game is BEST played with two controllers. Please use controllers if available. Keyboard controls are provided as a backup.

Left Stick: navigate menus and move cursor
East Button: place selected block
Triggers: switch shop item
Shoulders: rotate selected shop item
Start: ready/move to battle phase

This game has been tested with Xbox controllers and Gamecube controllers (with Mayflash adapter).
